categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic members

nodes.text: Chessa Dohhenty was a Human female who served as First Mate aboard the bulk freighter Colders Watch. She was in a relationship with the vessel's Chief Engineer, Dirk Harkness, and was also a member of the Alliance to Restore the Republic. During a stop at Kelada starport to smuggle blasters to her Alliance contacts, General Halomar Corros and Captain Tony Franco, she was discovered by a squad of stormtroopers and killed in front of Harkness.
The unpublished Star Wars Adventure Journal 16 spells Chessa's last name as "Dohenny."
